author: NOVA RIVEN
title: Neural Drift
text: I woke up inside the void. My body stayed in the past — only thoughts were allowed through

author: Kairo Null
title: Deadframe
text: He just stood there, waiting. Not for a person — for a signal. Like the memory of the network took shape.

author: Dr. Wex Omega
title: Primal.exe
text: We tried to resurrect the past. What we got was rage compressed into an algorithm.

author: Synthya Void
title: Glitch Panther
text: Cats always knew more than they showed. Especially the ones that vanish into code.

author: Tony Nguyen
title: White Protocol
text: At first, it was just a signal — clean, white, hypnotic. We didn't know it was alive.

author: Echo Zero
title: Retrocore
text: This console comes from a game no one remembers how to play. But it's still powered on.
